news.title: Stop battling over breastfeeding in war zones
news.abstract: As they sought to help those escaping the hell of Mosul and its siege, the staff of Doctors Without Borders grappled with a huge challenge: many, many undernourished babies.

news.title: Brutal talk is exactly what North Korea needs to hear
news.abstract: The North Korea crisis is deadly serious and President Donald Trump is pursuing a dangerous path, escalating tensions with his " fire and fury " and " locked and loaded " comments. His unpredictable behavior is being met with predictable criticism from the left.

news.title: Let them eat margarine?
news.abstract: France is sliding into an existential butter crisis, and guess who's responsible? Well, at least in part, it's China and Iran. But equal blame could be parceled out to government over-regulation, even global warming.

news.title: Merck CEO quits Trump council over Charlottesville
news.abstract: Merck CEO Kenneth Frazier quit President Trump's manufacturing council on Monday after Trump failed to condemn white supremacists.

news.title: Chinese media: Trump's trade probe will 'poison' relations
news.abstract: American threats to get tough on trade with China won't help solve the crisis over North Korea.

news.title: Japan's economy finds its 'sweet spot'
news.abstract: Japan's long suffering economy is firmly on the road to recovery.

news.title: Growing tomatoes in the concrete jungle
news.abstract: Seven years ago, Tony Hillery was volunteering at a New York City public school in Harlem.

news.title: City kids farm and eat the fruits of their labor
news.abstract: On an urban farm in New York City, 23-year-old Edgar turned his life around with the help of CNN Hero Tony Hillery and his nonprofit, Harlem Grown.

news.title: North Korea threatens strike on Guam
news.abstract: North Korea's military is " examining the operational plan " to strike areas around the US territory of Guam with medium-to-long-range strategic ballistic missiles, state-run news agency KCNA said early Wednesday local time.

news.title: Life in North Korea's crosshairs
news.abstract: With rough, calloused hands, Guam local Marco Martinez steadily trims his fishing line.
